Articles.Content:
The Kerbal Space Centre went crazy hiring new Kerbals and now the corridors are full of bored Kerbals which as I'm sure you know is a bad combination. So, what you need to do is get as many unmanned rovers as you can to the mun with a single launch!

Rules.

No debug console

No mods that add any parts (so mechjeb and all the like are allowed)

Rovers.

These can be as small as you like but they need at least 1 battery 1 communotron and 1 RTG/Solar panel.

(Oh yeah and they must move)

Scoring.

10 points for every Rover on the mun that is useable.

Leaderboards.

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

Thanks, this is my first post so any feedback would be appreciated.

I see this more as a challenge of who has the best hardware to handle megapart launchers. There really is no limit to this if you start running it on a NASA supercomputer. Also, no parts mods. What if we want to send kethane scouting rovers?
